properties.name: Chunk Animator
properties.description: Animates chunks as they load in; Recommended, as it is not too laggy unless your computer is trash-tier.

properties.name: Morpheus
properties.description: You can add morpheus to your client if you want to do a LAN server, this is useless otherwise

properties.name: Sound Filters
properties.description: Adds reverb and other sound features to minecraft. This mod is really nice and I would recommend it, but you can disable it if you don't like it.

properties.name: Inventory Tweaks
properties.description: Some people may not like how inventory tweaks manages the inventory.
